level.heading: Rules and regulations.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to issue such rules, regulations, and orders as may be necessary in order to effectuate the purposes of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 41-101.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 38 of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act). See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
